items.name: Survive the Nights Wiki
items.title: Survive the Nights Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the Survive the Nights Wikia!
items.desc: This Wikia is about the upcoming first person zombie survival game Survive the Nights. The game is similar to Day Z and other semi-realistic FPS zombie survival games, but features a much more in-depth crafting system that allows the player to create customized buildings, weapons and other items. Come check out the Wiki and learn more!
